scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=development node ./bin/www
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test mocha ./server-tests --exit && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
scripts.fe-test: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test node ./bin/www & NODE_ENV=test testcafe chrome frontend-tests/ && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
